statements: SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, email, permissions FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'joh%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE permissions ? 'admin';
SELECT DISTINCT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email, password FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE platform_name = 'Platform X' AND can_trade = true;
SELECT user_id, username, email, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice' AND email = 'alice@example.com';
SELECT user_id, platform_name, can_trade FROM permissions WHERE user_id = 2 AND platform_name IN ('Platform A', 'Platform B');
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE can_trade = true ORDER BY user_id ASC, platform_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, password FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT permission_id, description FROM permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_name FROM user_accounts JOIN user_permissions ON user_accounts.user_id = user_permissions.user_id ORDER BY permission_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE '%a%' ORDER BY username DESC;

SELECT user_accounts.user_id, permissions.permission_name, permissions.description FROM user_accounts JOIN user_permissions ON user_accounts.user_id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;

SELECT user_accounts.username, COUNT(user_permissions.permission_id) AS total_permissions FROM user_accounts JOIN user_permissions ON user_accounts.user_id = user_permissions.user_id GROUP BY user_accounts.username;

SELECT user_accounts.username, permissions.permission_name, permissions.description FROM user_accounts LEFT JOIN user_permissions ON user_accounts.user_id = user_permissions.user_id LEFT JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE user_permissions.permission_id IS NULL ORDER BY user_accounts.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT users.username, user_permissions.permission_id FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT users.user_id, user_roles.role_id, user_roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT exchange_name, location FROM cryptocurrency_exchange WHERE exchange_id = 5;
SELECT trade_date, trade_amount, trade_currency FROM trade_history ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT username, permission_type FROM user_accounts JOIN user_permissions ON user_accounts.user_id = user_permissions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_type = 'admin' AND user_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT exchange_name, location, supported_currencies FROM cryptocurrency_exchange WHERE location = 'USA' OR location = 'UK' ORDER BY exchange_name;
SELECT trade_id, trade_amount, trade_currency FROM trade_history WHERE trade_date >= '2022-01-01' AND trade_date < '2022-02-01';
